sqls.sql: select * from AT_C_MM_SAPRETURNRESULT where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if capsule_id_s??> and CAPSULE_ID_S=:capsule_id_s </#if> <#if chaged_by_s??> and CHAGEDdatagridUDARowsThree_BY_S=:chaged_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if class_id_s??> and CLASS_ID_S=:class_id_s </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if curings_candate_t??> and CURINGS_CANDATE_T=:curings_candate_t </#if> <#if curing_closemoulddate_t??> and CURING_CLOSEMOULDDATE_T=:curing_closemoulddate_t </#if> <#if curing_openmoulddate_t??> and CURING_OPENMOULDDATE_T=:curing_openmoulddate_t </#if> <#if curing_worker_s??> and CURING_WORKER_S=:curing_worker_s </#if> <#if dot_s??> and DOT_S=:dot_s </#if> <#if embryos_point_s??> and EMBRYOS_POINT_S=:embryos_point_s </#if> <#if equip_code_s??> and EQUIP_CODE_S=:equip_code_s </#if> <#if first_potflag_s??> and FIRST_POTFLAG_S=:first_potflag_s </#if> <#if isflag_s??> and ISFLAG_S=:isflag_s </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S=:material_code_s </#if> <#if material_name_s??> and MATERIAL_NAME_S=:material_name_s </#if> <#if memo_s??> and MEMO_S=:memo_s </#if> <#if mold_code_s??> and MOLD_CODE_S=:mold_code_s </#if> <#if patch_curingflag_s??> and PATCH_CURINGFLAG_S=:patch_curingflag_s </#if> <#if plan_no_s??> and PLAN_NO_S=:plan_no_s </#if> <#if productionver_s??> and PRODUCTIONVER_S=:productionver_s </#if> <#if product_date_t??> and PRODUCT_DATE_T=:product_date_t </#if> <#if quality_status_s??> and QUALITY_STATUS_S=:quality_status_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if shift_id_s??> and SHIFT_ID_S=:shift_id_s </#if> <#if solidif_yflag_s??> and SOLIDIF_YFLAG_S=:solidif_yflag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if special_mark_s??> and SPECIAL_MARK_S=:special_mark_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if tyreno_s??> and TYRENO_S=:tyreno_s </#if> <#if tyre_barcode_s??> and TYRE_BARCODE_S=:tyre_barcode_s </#if> <#if unit_s??> and UNIT_S=:unit_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_C_MM_SAPRETURNRESULT where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if capsule_id_s??> and CAPSULE_ID_S=:capsule_id_s </#if> <#if chaged_by_s??> and CHAGED_BY_S=:chaged_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if class_id_s??> and CLASS_ID_S=:class_id_s </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if curings_candate_t??> and CURINGS_CANDATE_T=:curings_candate_t </#if> <#if curing_closemoulddate_t??> and CURING_CLOSEMOULDDATE_T=:curing_closemoulddate_t </#if> <#if curing_openmoulddate_t??> and CURING_OPENMOULDDATE_T=:curing_openmoulddate_t </#if> <#if curing_worker_s??> and CURING_WORKER_S=:curing_worker_s </#if> <#if dot_s??> and DOT_S=:dot_s </#if> <#if embryos_point_s??> and EMBRYOS_POINT_S=:embryos_point_s </#if> <#if equip_code_s??> and EQUIP_CODE_S=:equip_code_s </#if> <#if first_potflag_s??> and FIRST_POTFLAG_S=:first_potflag_s </#if> <#if isflag_s??> and ISFLAG_S=:isflag_s </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S=:material_code_s </#if> <#if material_name_s??> and MATERIAL_NAME_S=:material_name_s </#if> <#if memo_s??> and MEMO_S=:memo_s </#if> <#if mold_code_s??> and MOLD_CODE_S=:mold_code_s </#if> <#if patch_curingflag_s??> and PATCH_CURINGFLAG_S=:patch_curingflag_s </#if> <#if plan_no_s??> and PLAN_NO_S=:plan_no_s </#if> <#if productionver_s??> and PRODUCTIONVER_S=:productionver_s </#if> <#if product_date_t??> and PRODUCT_DATE_T=:product_date_t </#if> <#if quality_status_s??> and QUALITY_STATUS_S=:quality_status_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if shift_id_s??> and SHIFT_ID_S=:shift_id_s </#if> <#if solidif_yflag_s??> and SOLIDIF_YFLAG_S=:solidif_yflag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if special_mark_s??> and SPECIAL_MARK_S=:special_mark_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if tyreno_s??> and TYRENO_S=:tyreno_s </#if> <#if tyre_barcode_s??> and TYRE_BARCODE_S=:tyre_barcode_s </#if> <#if unit_s??> and UNIT_S=:unit_s </#if>

SELECT 0 atr_key, '' serid_s, MATERIAL_CODE_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S, MATERIAL_NAME_S, CLASS_ID_S CLASS_ID_S, SPARE6_S, COUNT (1) TOTAL FROM AT_C_MM_SAPRETURNRESULT WHERE 1=1 AND SOLIDIF_YFLAG_S = '0' AND (SPARE6_S = '1' OR SPARE3_S = '1') AND PATCH_CURINGFLAG_S='1' <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if start_time?? && end_time??> and curing_openmoulddate_t between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S like:material_code_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> GROUP BY MATERIAL_CODE_S, MATERIAL_NAME_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S, CLASS_ID_S, SPARE6_S ORDER BY CLASS_ID_S, MATERIAL_CODE_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S

select count(1)from ( SELECT 0 atr_key, '' serid_s, MATERIAL_CODE_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S, MATERIAL_NAME_S, CLASS_ID_S CLASS_ID_S, SPARE6_S, COUNT (1) TOTAL FROM AT_C_MM_SAPRETURNRESULT WHERE 1=1 AND SOLIDIF_YFLAG_S = '0' AND (SPARE6_S = '1' OR SPARE3_S = '1') AND PATCH_CURINGFLAG_S='1' <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if start_time?? && end_time??> and curing_openmoulddate_t between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S like:material_code_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> GROUP BY MATERIAL_CODE_S, MATERIAL_NAME_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S, CLASS_ID_S, SPARE6_S ORDER BY CLASS_ID_S, MATERIAL_CODE_S, PRODUCTIONVER_S)

select ac.* from AT_C_MM_SAPRETURNRESULT ac where ac.record_flag_s = 'A' and (ac.solidif_yflag_s = '0' or ac.solidif_yflag_s is null) and ac.curing_openmoulddate_t between TO_DATE(:beginTime,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:endTime,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and ac.class_id_s = :classId and ac.productionver_s = :productionver and ac.material_code_s = :materialCode and ac.material_name_s = :materialName and ac.patch_curingflag_s='1'
select max(SUBSTR(Serid_s,6)) as serid from AT_INT_SAP_MESSAPPRODUCTION where s_factory_s='1'
select max(Batch_id_s) as batchId from AT_INT_SAP_MESSAPPRODUCTION where s_factory_s='1'
select max(SUBSTR(Serid_s,6)) as serid from AT_INT_SAP_MESSAPPRODUCTION where s_factory_s='2'
select max(SUBSTR(Batch_id_s,3)) as batchId from AT_INT_SAP_MESSAPPRODUCTION where s_factory_s='2'
